org.universAAL.middleware.interfaces.configuration.configurationDefinitionTypes

Interface DynamicDescribedEntityListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigurationManagerImpl

    public interface DynamicDescribedEntityListener
    Listener to be called when a DynamicDescribedEntity changes value.
    Author:
    amedrano

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void updatedDescription(DescribedEntity dentity)
      Call this method when the description of a Described Entity has changed, so configuration editors can update it.
      void updatedValue(DescribedEntity deEntity, Object value)
      Call this method when the entity has updated the value internally, so persistent value can be stored and configuration editors informed on the new value.
      In case of ConfigurationParameter type entities the validity of the new value will be checked against the restrictions.
      In case of ConfigurationFile type entities the value must be either: a File an URL a Base64 coded String a byte[] containing the data of the file a Base64Binary DO NOT USE INSIDE ConfigurableModule.configurationChanged(org.universAAL.middleware.interfaces.configuration.scope.Scope, Object) as it will guarantee an infinite loop.

    • Method Detail

      • updatedDescription

        void updatedDescription(DescribedEntity dentity)
        Call this method when the description of a Described Entity has changed, so configuration editors can update it.
        Parameters:
        dentity -

      • updatedValue

        void updatedValue(DescribedEntity deEntity,
                  Object value)
        Call this method when the entity has updated the value internally, so persistent value can be stored and configuration editors informed on the new value.
        In case of ConfigurationParameter type entities the validity of the new value will be checked against the restrictions.
        In case of ConfigurationFile type entities the value must be either:
        • a File
        • an URL
        • a Base64 coded String
        • a byte[] containing the data of the file
        • a Base64Binary
        DO NOT USE INSIDE ConfigurableModule.configurationChanged(org.universAAL.middleware.interfaces.configuration.scope.Scope, Object) as it will guarantee an infinite loop.
        Parameters:
        deEntity -
        value -
